relevant_findings.general: Laying in bed, appearing uncomfortable but otherwise no acute distress.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, exam limited by pain on inhalation.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Bowel sounds present, soft, non-distended, bandage in right lower quadrant is clean, dry, and intact.
relevant_findings.tenderness: Tenderness to palpation in right lower quadrant radiating to back.
relevant_findings.skin: No rashes or other lesions aside from bandages over surgical site.
